sentences.sentence: So whenever you feel alone, just remember that those kings will always be there to guide you. And so will I.
sentences.translation: 当你感觉寂寞的时候，记得那些君王一直会指引着你。我也会守护着你。

sentences.sentence: Love is just a word until someone comes along and gives it meaning.
sentences.translation: 爱不过是一个词而已，直到有一个人来到你面前，赋予它意义。

sentences.sentence: We will all be judged by the courage of our hearts.
sentences.translation: 最终，衡量我们的是内心的勇气。

sentences.sentence: Love is a very loaded word.
Major headway was made in reform and opening up.
sentences.translation: 改革开放迈出重要步伐。
